module.name: qBTorrents
module.short: Unit containing a container for torrents.

descr.p: This unit contains a set of objects to suport the torrents data aquired from the API.

element.name: TqBTorrentState
element.short: Torrent States.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsError
element.short: Some error occurred, applies to paused torrents.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsPausedUp
element.short: Torrent is paused and has finished downloading.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsPausedDl
element.short: Torrent is paused and has NOT finished downloading.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsQueuedUp
element.short: Queuing is enabled and torrent is queued for upload.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsQueuedDl
element.short: Queuing is enabled and torrent is queued for download.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsUploading
element.short: Torrent is being seeded and data is being transfered.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsStalledUp
element.short: Torrent is being seeded, but no connection were made.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsStalledDl
element.short: Torrent is being downloaded, but no connection were made.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsCheckingUp
element.short: Torrent has finished downloading and is being checked; this status also applies to preallocation (if enabled) and checking resume data on qBt startup.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsCheckingDl
element.short: Same as checkingUP, but torrent has NOT finished downloading.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsDownloading
element.short: Torrent is being downloaded and data is being transfered.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsMetaDl
element.short: Torrent has just started downloading and is fetching metadata.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.tsUnknown
element.short: Catch all state in case something changes in the API.

element.name: TqBTorrent
element.short: Container class for a single torrent.

element.name: TqBTorrents
element.short: Container class for a list of TqBTorrent.

element.name: StrToqBState
element.short: Translates from String to TqBTorrentState.

element.name: StrToqBState.Result
element.short: The translated TqBTorrentState.

element.name: StrToqBState.aState
element.short: The String to be translated.

element.name: qBStateToStr
element.short: Translates from TqBTorrentState to String.

element.name: qBStateToStr.Result
element.short: The translated String.

element.name: qBStateToStr.aState
element.short: The TqBTorrentState to be translated.
